item.title: Terms of Use
item.description: Valid from 15/03/2018 Thank you for using our products and services (the “Service/s”).

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: In this privacy policy we describe what kind of data we may collect of you in connection with your use of our applications, websites and related services and how we may use such data.
